quote: Liberals, it has been said, are generous with other peoples' money, except when it comes to questions of national survival when they prefer to be generous with other people's freedom and security.
quote_letters: LIBERALS IT HAS BEEN SAID ARE GENEROUS WITH OTHER PEOPLES MONEY EXCEPT WHEN IT COMES TO QUESTIONS OF NATIONAL SURVIVAL WHEN THEY PREFER TO BE GENEROUS WITH OTHER PEOPLES FREEDOM AND SECURITY
